lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards traded the rights to the Spanish guard Juan Carlos Navarro to the Memphis Grizzlies yesterday for a future first-round draft pick.The Wizards drafted Navarro in the second round, 40th over all, in 2002. Last month, FC Barcelona and Navarro agreed to a buyout that allowed him to head to the N.B.A. In Memphis, Navarro will play with the Spanish star Pau Gasol.
